fields.name: CreateMode
fields.description: The create mode to indicate whether the resource is being created or is being recovered from a deleted resource.

fields.name: EnablePurgeProtection
fields.description: Property specifying whether protection against purge is enabled for this managed HSM pool. Setting this property to true activates protection against purge for this managed HSM pool and its content - only the Managed HSM service may initiate a hard, irrecoverable deletion. Enabling this functionality is irreversible.

fields.name: EnableSoftDelete
fields.description: Property to specify whether the 'soft delete' functionality is enabled for this managed HSM pool. Soft delete is enabled by default for all managed HSMs and is immutable.

fields.name: HsmUri
fields.description: The URI of the managed hsm pool for performing operations on keys.

fields.name: InitialAdminObjectIds
fields.description: Array of initial administrators object ids for this managed hsm pool.

fields.name: NetworkAcls
fields.description: Rules governing the accessibility of the key vault from specific network locations.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
fields.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the managed hsm pool.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Control permission to the managed HSM from public networks.

fields.name: ScheduledPurgeDate
fields.description: The scheduled purge date in UTC.

fields.name: SoftDeleteRetentionInDays
fields.description: Soft deleted data retention days. When you delete an HSM or a key, it will remain recoverable for the configured retention period or for a default period of 90 days. It accepts values between 7 and 90.

fields.name: TenantId
fields.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID that should be used for authenticating requests to the managed HSM pool.
